issue.title: [fund.ts] weak_ptr's converting move constructor should be modified as well for array support

discussion.p: [memory.smartptr.weak.const] altered the constraints on weak_ptr's constructor from const weak_ptr<Y>& and const shared_ptr<Y>&. The constraints on the converting move constructor from weak_ptr<Y>&& was not, but should be, similarly modified.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4480.

pre.ins: weak_ptr(weak_ptr&& r) noexcept; template<class Y> weak_ptr(weak_ptr<Y>&& r) noexcept

p.ins: -?- Remark: The second constructor shall not participate in overload resolution unless Y* is compatible with T*.
-?- Effects: Move-constructs a weak_ptr instance from r.
-?- Postconditions: *this shall contain the old value of r. r shall be empty. r.use_count() == 0.
